title: WebDice
description: An app to throw 3D-simulated dice. Users can also change the number and color of dice. Motion controls for throwing the dice are available for mobile devices.

title: Clock3D
description: A simple app that displays a 3D Clock in a web browser, created to try out Three.js and become more familiar with it. The clock reads the time when the app loads, then calculates the angles of the hands and subsequent times based on the initial time.

title: HomePrint
description: An app to allow devices in a local network to print PDF files without installing a printer.

title: Jutsu
description: A platform to publish online art and design portfolios. Users upload images, assign categories, define media, and write a title and description for each portfolio piece. Portfolio pieces can be further organized by adding them to albums.

title: tast-E
description: An application for creating recipes, rating them and commenting on them.

title: AstroWar
description: A web-browser shoot-em up game where the player controls a spaceship battling other spaceships.
